```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F, warning = F, fig.width = 8, fig.height = 4)
```

## Goal of the analysis

Quantifying the extent of inhibition due to wastewater matrix components in eluted RNA, by serial dilution

## Running source codes

```{r cars}
source('general_functions.R')
source('analysis.R')
```

## Data output

```{r summarydatadisplay}
concise_results_abs %<>% mutate_if(is.numeric, format, digits = 3, scientific = T)
kable(concise_results_abs, caption = 'Summary of estimated copy #s')
```

### Individual replicates
```{r datadisplay}
results_abs %<>% mutate_if(is.numeric, format, digits = 3, scientific = T)
kable(results_abs, caption = 'Raw data and estimated copy #s')
```
